        public void addUser(java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String password,
                    int age,
                    java.lang.String userCategory)
        method that adds a new user to the userlist pre: userlist is initialized and has empty positions pro: userlist has a new user in the first empty position.
        Parameters:
        name, - it is the name/nickname of the user
        password, - it is the password of the user
        age, - it is the age of the user, it has to be above 0
        userCategory, - it is defalut category of the user, being NEWBIE

        public void addSong(java.lang.String title,
                    java.lang.String artist,
                    int duration,
                    java.lang.String releaseDate,
                    java.lang.String songGenre)
        Method that adds a new Song to the array songLIst pre: songList has to be initialized and has empty positions pos: songlist has a new song in the first empty postion
        Parameters:
        title, - it is the title of the song
        artist, - it is the artist/band of the song
        duration, - it is the duration of the song in seconds
        releaseDate, - it is the date from when the song was relased
        songGenre, - it is the genre of the song, Genre is in{ROCK,HIPHOP,MUSICACLASICA,REGGAE,SALSA,METAL}

      • addChoosedUser

        public User[] addChoosedUser(int option1)
        method that look for an empty position in the array usersThatControls and adds one already existing user in that array pre: there is atleast one user already created and the array has empty positions pos: a existing user will be added in the first empty position
        Parameters:
        option1, - it has the position of the user that will be added in the array userlist
        Returns:
        usersThatControls, it is an array witht the list of users that can modifie a specific Restricted playlist

      • calculateAverage

        public void calculateAverage(int option1,
                             double calification)
        method that gives a grade to a public PlayList pre: there is at least one public playList and its calification array has empty positions pro: one Playlist publicForAll will change its gradeAverage
        Parameters:
        option1, - it is the position in the array playListCollection of the playList that will have a new grade
        calification, - it is the grade that the user is giving to the playList

        playlistPos, - it is the position of the choosed Restricted playlist in the playListCollection
